file title: 	World Ocean Atlas 2001 1 degree annual analyzed mean  - temperature at depth 3000 metre 
data type: 	float
file type: 	binary
columns:	360
rows:	180
ref. system:	lat/long
ref. units:	deg
min. X:	-180
max. X:	180
min. Y:	-90
max. Y:	90
pos'n error:	unknown
resolution:	1.0000
min. value:	-1.125300
max. value:	13.800000
value units:	C
value error:	see error file
flag value:	255
flag def'n:	none
